name: Hockey Player VR
description:
Play hockey in first person view and develop your own tactics and tricks. Finally, a hockey game where you have 100% control. Test out your puck skills in online multiplayer mode.

Features:
  • 4 training modes
  • Multiplayer for 2 or 4 players
  • 100% control
  • Realistic physics
  • Leaderboards
  • Voice chat

It's quite easy to start playing it but if you want to become a master then well, be prepared for a countless hours spent on the virtual hockey arena. Feel invited to play the game, you will be surprised!
